description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Vung Tau, Vietnam. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Beachfront Vietnam Oasis in Central Vung Tau with Private Beach & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Vung Tau, a coastal city in southern Vietnam, from a stylish beachfront retreat. Take a leisurely stroll along the beach, or explore the city's historic sites, including the towering Jesus Christ Statue and Thich Ca Phat Dai Pagoda. Delight in the hotel's elegant facilities, including a shimmering infinity pool and fitness centre. Indulge in international and local Vietnamese cuisine at the Breezes Restaurant, or sip on a refreshing cocktail at the chic Sunset Lounge. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the city's vibrant nightlife, or take a short drive to the picturesque Vung Tau Lighthouse for sparkling city and sea views.

hotels.title: Five-Star Vung Tau City Hotel Near Back Beach with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the allure of Vietnam's coastal city, Vung Tau, with a stay at the elegantly positioned hotel, a mere 90-minute drive from the vibrant Ho Chi Minh City. Dine at the Riviera Restaurant, where international cuisine meets local flavours, enjoy a refreshing drink at the Corniche Ultra Lounge or take tipples by the outdoor pool. When it's time to explore, the hotel is just a short stroll from Back Beach and the Christ of Vung Tau, a towering statue offering panoramic city and sea views. For golf enthusiasts, the Paradise Golf Resort is within easy reach, providing an excellent opportunity to tee off in a picturesque setting. Additionally, donâ€™t miss the chance to wander through the local markets, where you can sample delicious street food and shop for unique handicrafts that reflect the vibrant culture of Vung Tau.

seo.title: Hotel a Vung Tau - Vietnam Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Vung Tau, Vietnam con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
